name: Market Square
description: A large open plaza where merchants gather to sell their wares; adventurers can experience the hustle and bustle of commerce, meet traders from distant lands, or witness market day festivities.
atmosphere: The square is filled with the bustling energy of commerce and the sound of merchants from distant lands haggling over exotic goods. The air carries the promise of wealth and the essential nature of international trade, while the atmosphere crackles with the excitement of market day and the discovery of rare treasures from far-off lands.
